ygData.subject: Re: Carillion song (was  Bard only equipment, a rant)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Feerot, target an ogre ... *laughs* oh that is EXACTLY what I am saying...um, or not. I am willing to bet you couldn t charisma them out of KoS. it took a
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message----->So based on what you are saying, I could go into
Feerot, target an ogre
>guard (bouncer), sing the carillion and make it to where I'm not KOS
>anymore, and then merrily waltz around the zone with no worry of ever
>getting attacked by any ogre guards.


*laughs* oh that is EXACTLY what I am saying...um, or not. I am willing to
bet you couldn't charisma them out of KoS. it took a lot of gnoll killing
before I could get the Highpass guards to like me enough to GIVE them a
gnoll skin.

Tszaaz E'Taurguin
